views.name: Add risk assessment
views.title: Add risk assessment
views.submit_action_message: The risk assessment was successfully added to the database. To add more, please reload this page.

field_options.description: Please enter a unique title for this risk assessment.
Select which department this risk assessment is for.
Describe the details or the specific definition of the risk.
State all implications and how the risk will affect operations, including what or who will be impacted if the risk is not mitigated.
Select the likelihood of this risk occurring.
Select the level of potential impact or severity of this risk.
Define a detailed list or plan of activities that must be undertaken to control or mitigate this risk.
Please select the risk manager in charge of leading and implementing the control activities.
Specify a different manager who has been tasked with peer reviewing, monitoring, or tracking the resolution of this risk.
Please enter the chance (success rate in percentage) that the planned control activities will resolve the risk. E.g., 100 or 75.
If the control activities don't work, define another plan that will be used or write down procedures to be implemented.
Please select the current state of this risk assessment.

rows.field_474647: The industry was reported to have entered a downward trend in Q2 of this year. Our company should mitigate this risk by cutting costs on non-essential items.
rows.field_474648: Our revenue numbers will decrease. Worst case scenario is will have to terminate some of our projects
rows.field_474758:
1. Send a memo to both operations and management about this risk. 
2. Go over all purchase requests.
3. Put all non-essential purchase requests on hold.
rows.field_474765: If the controls fails. We have no choice but reduce some projects.

rows.field_474623: Moving of equipment and supplies to offices pose risk on staff
rows.field_474647: There were requests to move equipment and supplies from one office to another. Moving them manually without the appropriate tools could be risky for our staff.
rows.field_474648:
Possible staff injuries may occur. 
Possible damages to equipment and supplies.
rows.field_474758:
1. Acquire moving equipment. 
2. Properly schedule transfers.
rows.field_474765: Provide training to our own staff.

rows.field_474623: Building's electrical cabinet is getting old and outdated
rows.field_474647: The building's electrical cabinet, along with its instruments, is getting old, worn out, and outdated. For several years, our business has acquired tools and equipment that are more demanding of our current electrical load.
rows.field_474648:
Damages to property. 
Fire hazard.
Injuries to employees.
Equipment downtime could result in putting operations on hold.
rows.field_474758:
1. Make a list of all the equipment and their power requirements.
2. Seek professional advice and recommendations.
3. Obtain a second opinion.
4. Engage the services of professionals to upgrade our electrical cabinet.
rows.field_474765: Put on hold all requests for more equipment.

rows.field_474623: Several reported bugs on Project X
rows.field_474647: Our product, Project X, has been receiving a lot of bug reports from our QA team. Some customers have noticed some of the reported bugs as well.
rows.field_474648:
Deteriorating quality of Project X. 
More external customers will start to notice.
It could affect our brand.
We could loose customers.
Project X could be terminated.
rows.field_474758:
1. Request that our QA team conduct additional tests.
2. Identify critical bugs and prioritize their resolution.
3. Have our software engineers address the bugs in order of priority. 
4. Release a statement to customers that we are fixing the reported issues. 
5. Decide on a launch date.
rows.field_474765: Offer discounts and vouchers to affected customers.

rows.field_474647: There were a few bugs reported after the release of Project Y. They were not critical issues.
rows.field_474648:
Although the reported bugs were not critical, there is a possibility that they could lead to more complicated issues.

If left unattended, customers may notice.
rows.field_474758:
1. Assign this bug to a team with a light workload.
2. Have our QA team ready.
3. Make the fixes available quietly.
rows.field_474765: Add more resources to address the reported bugs.

rows.field_474623: The icon proposed for Project Z does not match
rows.field_474647: The icon used for Project Z does not match our brand. Recommendations from Marketing were raised.
rows.field_474648: This could affect our brand, albeit not too seriously.
rows.field_474758:
1. Have the R&D department meet with Marketing.
2. Stick with our brand.
rows.field_474765: Get another software engineer to work on this.

rows.field_474623: Python released an update that could break Project T
rows.field_474647: Python released an update that fixed a bug but could break the workarounds we implemented on Project T.
rows.field_474648:
More bugs will be reported, and customers will start to notice. 
Sales can get affected.
rows.field_474758:
1. Request that the Project T manager prioritize this risk.
2. Prepare our QA.
3. Schedule a silent release of the fixes as soon as possible.
rows.field_474765: Do not use Python's recent updates.

rows.field_474623: Customer X was said to be involved in a scandal.
rows.field_474647: Customer X was part of a recent tech scandal. Other providers are pulling their support for Customer X.
rows.field_474648:
This can affect our business and brand. 
Sales could be affected.
rows.field_474758:
1. Speak with our attorney.
2. Be prepared for a minor shift in how we market our products.
3. Orient our sales team to the changes.

rows.field_474623: A couple of our software engineers are planning to leave
rows.field_474647:
There has been some chatter regarding potential departures among our software engineers.
Apparently, they're being recruited by a firm from out of state.
rows.field_474648: If this turns out to be true, then eight of our products will be affected. Especially considering how rare their skill sets are in the workplace.
rows.field_474758:
1. Confirm this news with our out-of-state contacts.
2. Conduct research on current industry rates.
3. Talk to our employees about the possibility of increased salaries.
4. Ask employees if we can help them improve their working environment.
rows.field_474765:
If we're not able to convince our employees, we prepare for training documentation. 
Ask HR to start pooling candidates.

rows.field_474647: Due to conflicts outside the country, it was reported that a surge in inflation was inevitable.
rows.field_474648: This could affect our merchandise sales.
rows.field_474758:
1. Have Finance review our accounts.
2. Schedule a meeting with Sales.
3. Seek out better suppliers.
4. Adjust our merchandise prices.
rows.field_474765: We just have to keep on looking for better suppliers. Contact our network.

field_options.description: Please enter the risk manager's full name.
Please specify the risk manager's level from the selection below.
Please select the department this manager belongs to.
Enter the manager's business phone extension number.
Enter the manager's current phone number.
Please enter the manager's email address.
Write down any notes or remarks about this manager.
Please tick the checkbox below if this manager is still active.

rows.field_474578: Been with the company for quite a while. But left to look for greener pastures.
That one with the cool glasses.
Kid of a popular business tycoon.
Nephew of the manager from the other team.
That one who moved to the 7th floor.
Just asked for a review ahead of the schedule.
Stays close to the exit during lunch.
Work is starting to be more comfortable.
Just joined the group last month.
Heard singing so loud in the pantry. Nice voice.
Just joined last week to help HR.

rows.field_474638: The research and development division is responsible for the majority of this company's operations. Here, software development is administered. It is divided into various project teams.
The finance team and auditors of the company report to this department. The Finance department is responsible for the financial records and audits of the company.
The legal department provides legal expertise that is advantageous to the strategies and planning of the organization. This department has a small seasonal workforce.
Our liaison officers and logistical partners fall under the purview of this department.
This department handles every aspect of the recruitment and hiring processes.
Our organization's press releases and branding are handled by the marketing department.
This department manages sales and sales strategies and is a vital part of the organization.

views.name: Add an update
views.title: Add an update
views.submit_action_message: The update was successfully added to the database. To add more, please reload this page.

field_options.description: Please enter a unique numeric identifier for this update record.
Please select the risk assessment for which this update is intended.
Write down the specific or detailed information regarding this update.
Please select the risk manager who provided this update.

rows.field_474778: All control activities were completed earlier than expected.
The customer is still dealing with the scandal; fortunately, marketing has mitigated the risk on our side.
Our moving equipment was delivered early. Plus, our staff were trained well.
Verified that the risk was addressed.
We have successfully cut costs for Q2.
QA reported a big improvement on Project Y.
Most of the affected modules were updated. The release for fixes was already scheduled.
We are halfway to our resolutions.
The QA team has already started testing some of the submitted fixes.
Done with assessments and proceeding with hiring professionals.
Found a reliable professional for this task.
Have not heard from our contact yet.
Did initial talks with our employees. Noted some concerns.
